description:
Noita is a magical action roguelite set in a world where every pixel is physically simulated. Fight, explore, melt,
burn, freeze, and evaporate your way through the procedurally generated world using wands you've created yourself.

v0.6.0.description:
Implementation for Killsanity.
APWorld generates locations based on 4 options

1.  No Enemies - (Default) Killsanity Off.
2.  Main Path - Only enemies you'd expect to see on the main path
3.  Side Path - Add enemies from immediate side paths
4.  Reasonable - Add enemies accessible from the surface and limited digging
5.  Pain - Add enemies that require far exploration, and include some rarer variants

Enemies with horrible appearance rates like the special mimics, chef, and special things like Santa are never included.

The mod should be dropped in the mods folder of your Noita install
APWorld can be double clicked to install, and has no problem existing alongside the official release
v0.6.0.title: v0.6.0

v0.6.5.description:
### Updated

Updated animal names to use the Finnish text.
Animal locations are now scoped to their regions.
Nicely-er integrated locations in the APWorld itself.
v0.6.5.title: v0.6.5

v0.7.0.description:
### New Features
Add Forge Sanity - Portal Spell, Broken Wand, Emerald Tablets

### Small Adds
Add AP Logo to pedestals with checks
Add Gamma spell to item pool
Potions (and other applicable items) that are AP Items and break, now count as checked

### Bugfix
Fix Turrets that spawned left not counting for checks
Perk Altar no longer deletes perks that are sold in the shops nearby
v0.7.0.title: v0.7.0

v0.8.0.description:
### New Features
Killsanity support for Apotheosis!
Enable support via the YAML. If you don't use Apotheosis, you can ignore it!

### Small Adds
Added crystals, cocoons, and eggs to the main_path setting.

### Bugfix
Fix Houre and Turret not counting sometimes.

### Killsanity Web Tracker
My personal tracker I use to assist in this chaos. Offers a personally more pleasing, minimal UI. Click on Killsanity targets to see their Biome locations, and link out to their wiki page!
https://madolinn.github.io/noita-ap-web-tracker/index.html
v0.8.0.title: v0.8.0 - Apotheosis

v0.8.5.description:
### New Features
Spawn in an little weird home in the sky. Shelves for each tier of wands, and bins for the various items!

### Bugfix
Fix Worm Cocoon not counting most of the time.
Spawn change fixes the Mines checks not generating fully first go around!

###### Killsanity Web Tracker
###### My personal tracker I use to assist in this chaos. Offers a personally more pleasing, minimal UI. Click on Killsanity targets to see their Biome locations, and link out to their wiki page!
###### https://madolinn.github.io/noita-ap-web-tracker/index.html
v0.8.5.title: v0.8.5 - A Homey new Home

v0.9.0.description:
### New Features
New option for bosses to have "Souls" as items. This will prevent the respective boss from spawning until you have acquired their soul.
- Option for only gating bosses that have checks according to the "Bosses as Checks" option
- Option to gate all bosses behind souls

**If Souls are turned on, the Sampo will be gated behind Kolmi's soul as well.**

###### Bugfix
###### I didn't find anything broken yet this time around, hurray!

###### Killsanity Web Tracker
###### My personal tracker I use to assist in this chaos. Offers a personally more pleasing, minimal UI. Click on Killsanity targets to see their Biome locations, and link out to their wiki page!
###### https://madolinn.github.io/noita-ap-web-tracker/index.html
v0.9.0.title: v0.9.0 - Boss Souls

v0.9.1.description:
# Bugfixes

- Remove Worm Cocoon because it's too unreliable to get as a check from some internal shenanigans.
- Fix Egg Dragon not counting on kill.
- Fix Perks (Souls included) not being delivered if offline.
v0.9.1.title: v0.9.1 - Bugs Fixes

v0.9.2.description:
**No changes were made to the Noita Mod itself in this release.**

### APWorld Bug Fixes

- Fix Apotheosis Locust Swarm duplicate name
- Fix Duplicate Entrance world generation error with Apotheosis enabled
v0.9.2.title: v0.9.2 - APWorld Error Resolution

v0.9.3.description:
**No changes were made to the Noita Mod itself in this release.**

### APWorld Bug Fixes

- Fix missing boss souls for Sauvojen Tuntija, Mestarien Mestari, Tapion Vasalli, Kolmisilmän Sydän, Kolmisilmän Silmä (thanks capitalization!)
- Fix Apotheosis error for empty zone
v0.9.3.title: v0.9.3 - Missing Locations Bug Fixes

v0.9.4.description:
# Mod Bug Fixes
- AP Spells should now properly spawn in shops (And not an error item)

# APWorld Bug Fixes
- Snowy Chasm boss + orb should now be generating
- Moved Abyss Orb Tablet check to Hisii Base Sphere, since Abyss Orb is way before the anvil in logic.
v0.9.4.title: v0.9.4 - Fix More Patch
